net.cnri.repository

Interface Repository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DirectRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDirectRepository, AbstractRepository, BdbjeRepository, ClientRepository, DirectRepositoryWrapper, EmbeddedRepository, FilesystemRepository, HighLevelRepository, InternalRepository, LayeredRepository, MemoryRepository, MigrationRepository, NetworkedRepository, ReferenceCountingRepositoryWrapper, RepositoryWrapper, RestRepository, ServletRepository, SQLiteRepository, SyncingRepository, UnionRepository

    public interface Repository
    An object for accessing a Digital Object Repository. The Repositories class provides factory methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the repository and release all resources.
      DigitalObject createDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
      Creates a new digital object with the given identifier in this repository.
      void deleteDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
      Deletes a digital object from the repository.
      DigitalObject getDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
      Returns the digital object with the given identifier from this repository.
      java.lang.String getHandle()
      Returns the handle of the repository.
      DigitalObject getOrCreateDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
      Returns the digital object with the given identifier from this repository, which is created if it does not exist.
      CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> listHandles()
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the identifiers for digital objects accessible through this repository.
      CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> listObjects()
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository.
      CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> search(Query query)
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object with default parameters.
      CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> search(Query query, QueryParams queryParams)
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object and the parameters defined in the QueryParams object.
      CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> search(java.lang.String query)
      Deprecated. 
      Use search(Query,QueryParams) with first argument a RawQuery and second argument null.
      CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> searchHandles(Query query)
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects handles accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object with default parameters.
      CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> searchHandles(Query query, QueryParams queryParams)
      Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects handles accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object and the parameters defined in the QueryParams object.
      CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> searchHandles(java.lang.String query)
      Deprecated. 
      Use searchHandles(Query,QueryParams) with first argument a RawQuery and second argument null.
      CloseableIterator<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> searchMapping(java.lang.String query)
      Deprecated. 
      boolean verifyDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
      Verifies whether a digital object with the given identifier can be accessed via this repository.

    • Method Detail

      • getHandle

        java.lang.String getHandle()
        Returns the handle of the repository. May return null for local repositories.
        Returns:
        the handle of the repository, or null if not available.

      • verifyDigitalObject

        boolean verifyDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                     throws RepositoryException
        Verifies whether a digital object with the given identifier can be accessed via this repository.
        Parameters:
        handle - an identifier for a digital object
        Returns:
        whether a digital object with that identifier can be accessed via this repository
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • createDigitalObject

        DigitalObject createDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                           throws CreationException,
                                  RepositoryException
        Creates a new digital object with the given identifier in this repository. Passing null requests that the repository assign a new unique identifier; this method will throw UnsupportedOperationException if the given repository does not support that functionality.
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the new digital object, or null to request that the repository assign a new unique identifier.
        Returns:
        the newly-created digital object
        Throws:
        CreationException - if an object with the given identifier already exists within the repository
        RepositoryException

      • getDigitalObject

        DigitalObject getDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                        throws RepositoryException
        Returns the digital object with the given identifier from this repository.
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the digital object
        Returns:
        the digital object, or null if no such object can be accessed through this repository
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • getOrCreateDigitalObject

        DigitalObject getOrCreateDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                                throws RepositoryException
        Returns the digital object with the given identifier from this repository, which is created if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the digital object
        Returns:
        the digital object
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • deleteDigitalObject

        void deleteDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                  throws RepositoryException
        Deletes a digital object from the repository.
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the digital object
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • listHandles

        CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> listHandles()
                                         throws RepositoryException
        Provides a CloseableIterator view of the identifiers for digital objects accessible through this repository.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • listObjects

        CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> listObjects()
                                      throws RepositoryException
        Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • search

        CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> search(Query query,
                                        QueryParams queryParams)
                                 throws RepositoryException
        Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object and the parameters defined in the QueryParams object.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to perform
        queryParams - parameters for the query, or null for default parameters
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator over the results. Some implementations may return QueryResults.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • searchHandles

        CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> searchHandles(Query query,
                                                  QueryParams queryParams)
                                           throws RepositoryException
        Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects handles accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object and the parameters defined in the QueryParams object.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to perform
        queryParams - parameters for the query, or null for default parameters
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator over the results. Some implementations may return QueryResults.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • search

        CloseableIterator<DigitalObject> search(Query query)
                                 throws RepositoryException
        Provides a CloseableIterator view of the digital objects accessible through this repository under search bounds defined in the Query object with default parameters.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to perform
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator over the results. Some implementations may return QueryResults.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

        CloseableIterator<java.lang.String> searchHandles(Query query)

        Parameters:
        query - the query to perform
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterator over the results. Some implementations may return QueryResults.
        Throws:
